Pages.Text: What, can’t figure out how an elevator works now?

'Course I can!
There seems to be some sort of lock mechanism for the higher floor buttons.
Well, what do you expect me to do about it from over here?
Can’t you, like, hack it or something?
Not from here. There’re probably people with a key or something that grants them clearance to the higher levels.

So, I just need to find this key card then I’m on my way.
Sounds like its time for me to kick ass and ask questions later!
